```scss
// Property: audioSessionCategory
// Description: A constant for the audio session category to be used.
// Component(s): Ti.Media
'.audio-session-category-ambient': { audioSessionCategory: Ti.Media.AUDIO_SESSION_CATEGORY_AMBIENT }
'.audio-session-category-playback': { audioSessionCategory: Ti.Media.AUDIO_SESSION_CATEGORY_PLAYBACK }
'.audio-session-category-play-and-record': { audioSessionCategory: Ti.Media.AUDIO_SESSION_CATEGORY_PLAY_AND_RECORD }
'.audio-session-category-record': { audioSessionCategory: Ti.Media.AUDIO_SESSION_CATEGORY_RECORD }
'.audio-session-category-solo-ambient': { audioSessionCategory: Ti.Media.AUDIO_SESSION_CATEGORY_SOLO_AMBIENT }
```
